doc.title: A Day Out with Gordy
doc.plot: Adorned in pink, Flo gets a nasty shock when her weathered but handsome husband of 40 years, Harry, backs his chrome boat over her beloved cat, Gordy. Now a grocery bag sits in the back seat, with a dead cat that is still warm, but the atmosphere in the car is chilly as the couple heads to the local diner for the early bird senior special dinner. Events take a bizarre turn at the restaurant when a threadbare thief, pilfers the bag containing the kitty's corpse.
